players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Whoa, Diana’s dead already. We need to hear from everyone. Bob, Charlie—what are your thoughts on who benefits from this kill? Any reads from tone or timing?"
Charlie: "Shock kill on Diana suggests mafioso avoiding experienced voices. Alice opened by prompting others—neutral. Bob, what’s your take? Any reason Diana would suspect you or Alice last game?"
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. I’m the detective. Vote Alice today."

Charlie: "Alice, full claim please. Bob, why did you pick Alice N1 and what exact role result did you get? Also, why would maf kill Diana if you’re detective? Everyone: if Alice flips town, Bob is next."
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Alice is confirmed mafia from my N1 check. She’s silent because she’s caught. Charlie, lock vote on Alice and we win today."

Alice was arrested
